--- abbreviated_edge_right.sql
 ->
--- AST
&ast.GQLPathPattern{
  PathTermList: []*ast.GQLQuantifiablePathTerm{
    &ast.GQLQuantifiablePathTerm{
      Hint:     (*ast.Hint)(nil),
      PathTerm: &ast.GQLAbbreviatedEdgeRight{
        First: 1,
        Last:  1,
      },
      Quantifier: nil,
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
->
